variables.description: Specifies the number of consecutive health probe successes required before moving the instance to                   the Healthy state.
variables.name: HealthyThreshold

variables.description: Specifies the approximate interval, in seconds, between health checks of an individual                   instance.
variables.name: Interval

variables.description: Specifies the instance's protocol and port to check. The protocol can be TCP,                   HTTP, HTTPS, or SSL. The range of valid ports is 1 through 65535.
variables.name: Target

variables.description: Specifies the amount of time, in seconds, during which no response means a failed health probe.                   This value must be less than the value for Interval.
variables.name: Timeout

variables.description: Specifies the number of consecutive health probe failures required before moving the instance to                   the Unhealthy state.
variables.name: UnhealthyThreshold
